name: Carp
text: Just a carp. Simple to catch, simple to grow on your own in the pond.

name: Red stripped fashon
text: Got their name for their stripes, that are very visible even in the low light.

name: Ordinary whiteheaded stole
text: Very delicious when fried with pepper and vegetable. Locals prefer them over anything.

name: Blue stripped royaner 'Roya'
text: Quite rare in other waters, because this type of fish loves to hang out here. Scientists stiil figuring out why. What is so special about these waters?

name: Kerata carp
text: Named after the waters Kerata not far from this place. The fish loves traveling a lot, for some reason. Both in groups and on their own.

name: Blue finged stripped sott
text: Stripes. Obviously. Best served with vegetables and souses. The locals have at least 5 different dishes with this fish.
